title: Critérium du Dauphiné Stage 6: Primož Roglič Powers to Win, Drops Evenepoel to Prove He’s Back
content:
Sparks fly in the first of three summit finales to decide the 2024 Critérium du Dauphiné, Matteo Jorgenson defends third overall, with Evenepoel ceding the leader's jersey: 'No time to panic.'

Read the full article at Critérium du Dauphiné Stage 6: Primož Roglič Powers to Win, Drops Evenepoel to Prove He’s Back on Velo.
author: ahood
